original_text: For even hereunto were ye called: because Christ also suffered for us, leaving us an example, that ye should follow his steps:
korean_text: 이를 위하여 너희가 부르심을 받았으니 그리스도도 너희를 위하여 고난을 받으사 너희에게 본을 끼쳐 그 자취를 따라오게 하려 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: For even hereunto were ye called
because Christ also suffered for us
sentences.korean_translation: 그리스도께서도 우리를 위해 고난 받으셨기 때문이라

sentences.original_text: that ye should follow his steps
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 그의 발자취를 따르게 하려 하심이라
